评论概述: Comfortable, Wrinkle-Free, and Versatile Dress Shirt
评论详情: I ordered this men's dress shirt in a regular fit, and it has quickly become a go-to in my wardrobe. Made with a 60% polyester and 40% cotton blend, the fabric strikes a nice balance between durability and comfort. It feels sturdy enough to last but still soft and breathable, even during long days. The wrinkle-free feature is one of the highlights—no ironing needed after washing, which is always a plus.  The fit is just right. It’s not too tight or baggy, and I appreciate that tall sizes are available for those who need extra sleeve or body length. The classic spread collar is versatile enough for both formal events and casual outings. I’ve paired this shirt with a tie for a business meeting and also worn it open with sleeves rolled up for a more relaxed look. It transitions seamlessly between different occasions, which is great for someone who doesn’t want to maintain separate wardrobes for work and social events.  The quality of this shirt is evident in its details. It comes in a range of colors, making it easy to mix and match with different outfits. I haven’t noticed any issues with fading or shrinking after washing. For care, I’ve just machine-washed and hung it up right out of the dryer—no hassle, and it’s ready to wear.  Overall, this is a solid dress shirt that combines practicality with style. It’s ideal for business settings, casual outings, or even more formal occasions. Whether you need a reliable shirt for work or something stylish for an event, this one delivers.

The image accurately represents the product.  I recently got the GIANZEN Men's Dress Shirt, and it has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe. The regular fit and solid long sleeves give it a classic, polished look, perfect for both business and casual settings. The wrinkle-free fabric is a huge plus, saving me time on ironing. I'm very pleased and highly recommend it for anyone looking for a versatile and stylish shirt.  I recommend this product.
Ordered for my son, great color. This is a decent shirt, but it does run small. Luckily he's between a medium and a large so a large fit him well.  Tapered for that Tailored Style Fit
This shirt looks well made and is comfortable to wear. the sizing was accurate and the fabric feels like a quality material was used. highly recommend.

It really is a nice button down shirt for business dress attire, it just sadly can't be worn by my husband who normally wears 2X. I suggest ordering a size up, and be prepared to iron it. Peace
This is a nice green collared shirt - true to size, and the color of the collar is going to stand up under my husband's sweater for holiday parties. Dry clean this one if you do not want to iron!
This is a basic but nice dress shirt for the price. I like the navy color I ordered and it fits well.
This shirt was nice but I washed it twice and dried it and it was for a wedding. My son put it on and the lines from shipping just won’t disappear!

评论概述: Not a bad shirt! If you like a more fitted look, consider a size down.

I'm used to wearing a more fitted / slim fit look and I feel there's a bit more room than I prefer. If I were or order again, I'd get a size down. If you're looking for a more loose standard fit, these are true to size.
I am satisfied with this shirt.  Sizing seems accurate, and the shirt is comfortable.  I'm not big on ironing, and this shirt comes out of the laundry with an acceptable amount of wrinkling.
nice and comfortable to wear. good seam construction. does not feel cheap in any way. Fabric is neither to thick and hot or too thin and unflattering. Love it

This shirt is a nice material. It’s soft and comfortable. I ordered my husbands normal size and this fit well. It doesn’t have a lot of stretch but fits well. He liked that the neck wasn’t choking him and the material wasn’t wrinkly. Great price for the quality.
Fit nice and the stretch was really good.

I like this dress shirt, fit nice, the quality is great, great value.

评论概述: Great color and very soft fabric...
评论详情: Great color and very soft fabric...  A very soft and functional dress shirt. Love the collar and how it fits and lays down smoothly. This is a slim fit shirt, so it was a bit tight for me. I may have underestimated my own size but the shirt works well, when wearing. Check your measurements - this does fit smaller than usual.  The color is this nice very pale lavender/white color that is very understated but has a classic look for wearing. Looks great with anything you pair it with. A nice buy indeed.

This is a nice dress shirt in a bright mustard to liven up a dark suit. I got a large for my son who is about 5 foot 3 and 160lbs and it was too large but not by much. We will put in his closet and he will wear it when he grows into it for his piano recitals and other business casual events he has to attend with me because it is well made and worth holding.

This shirt is way oversized for the size chart, and the material is just OK.  I ordered this in an XXL because that's what I wear as a big guy who's 6'3" and 225#.  XXL usually fits me perfectly but this shirt is like wearing a tent....it's HUGE!  Also, the fabric is stiff and thick, kinda like a cross between linen and polyester, and doesn't feel super comfortable.  The color is pretty good, but that's really the only thing I like about this shirt.  I'd say order at least one size smaller than you normally would, especially if you're ordering a bigger size.

This thing really doesn't wrinkle.  You can wad it up and leave it on the couch.  You can lean your sweaty and tired back against it all day at the office.  You can shove it into a suitcase.  And every time, it stays wrinkle free enough to wear in public.  That's my kind of shirt.

I want to love this shirt. The collars are perfect. But the sleeves are too long and too wide. I got my size and this just was too big. So have that in mind. I feel like if I got a size smaller it will fix the sleeve problem but then I will have a tough time buttoning this up. I love the quality. The color is perfect. But the size is my biggest issue. Nicely packaged. And no weird factory smell. But I just cant recommend this because the size is just a big issue.
Vibrant color, a bit oversized in fit, but not terribly, comfy.

I was so grateful I had ordered it early and had it for him. I steamed out the original wrinkles from packaging and then it looked great and hung well on him. He's a bigger guy and it worked through his shoulders and gut.  Definitely not the shirt for a slim guy.

评论概述: Reliable and Practical Daily Wear Business Casual+
评论详情: Pros: Wrinkle-Free Fabric: The wrinkle-free material makes this shirt a low-maintenance choice, perfect for busy mornings when you need to look sharp without spending extra time ironing.  Comfortable Regular Fit: The regular fit is well-designed, offering enough room for comfort without feeling too loose. It’s ideal for all-day wear, whether you’re in meetings or on the move.  Versatile Style: With its clean and solid color design, this shirt works equally well for both formal business attire and more relaxed office environments. It pairs nicely with both suits and chinos. Cons: Limited Color Range: More color options would be a welcome addition for those who like to have a variety of choices in their work wardrobe.  Final Thoughts: Its wrinkle-free fabric and comfortable fit make it an excellent option for those who need a reliable shirt that can keep up with their busy schedule. While it could benefit from a wider color selection and a softer touch, it delivers great value and functionality for everyday use, making it a worthy addition to your wardrobe.
Surprised at the quality. Would compare against any mid tier dress shirt

评论概述: GIANZEN Men's Dress Shirts Regular Fit Solid Long Sleeve Wrinkle-Free
评论详情: This review is for the GIANZEN Men's Dress Shirts Regular Fit Solid Long Sleeve Wrinkle-Free:  I'm just gonna knock two stars right off the bat for the product advertising itself as "wrinkle-free" and coming in wrinkled. That's just not okay.  Other than that, fits great, at $17, you're not getting extremely good quality, but a nice backup shirt.

Gianzen has crafted an excellent men’s dress shirt that is both wrinkle-free and casual. Made from a fantastic blend of cotton and polyester, it strikes the perfect balance between comfort and durability. The shirt exudes elegance and sophistication at first glance. With a regular fit, it offers comfort without compromising on style, ensuring you look and feel your best all day. I’m particularly impressed by the wrinkle-free design, which makes maintenance a breeze. The variety of colors available is also fantastic—having options to choose from is always a plus!

This is very bright color. The stitching is mid though. I don't wear this style of shirt often so it should last me a long time, but if worn weekly, probably won't last as long as a department store brand.

评论概述: Love the color and fabric, not so wrinkle free

That said, I love that fabric. It is a "regular" fit as they say, which means it doesn't really taper in under the arms or anything like that, and bunches up a little at the belt line.

This is a great button down for the office.  Great colorway, nice material.  Feels very breathable when you've got it on.  Material has a nice bit of stretch to it also.  Washes nicely and when you hang it up, won't require much ironing.  Works for me.  Size runs a bit small, so keep that in mind.  👍

The blend of fabric is nice. It is 40 percent cotton and 60 percent Polyester. I was nervous about the polyester part because it can be to synthetic feeling but with the cotton they added makes the shirt comfortable with some breathable fabric as well.  I would say the pink color is nice and the photos are pretty spot on. The fit is nice an looks great.

It is a very nice shirt at a reasonable price. By looking through all the styles and makes available online I was able to choose exactly what I wanted instead of the limited selection I would find in a store.

评论概述: Comfortable and Stylish Addition to My Wardrobe
评论详情: I recently purchased this shirt and I couldn't be happier with it! The fit is true to size and offers a tailored look without feeling restrictive. The fabric is soft and breathable, making it perfect for warm days. I love how versatile it is; it pairs well with both dress pants and jeans. Overall, it’s a fantastic value for the price and has quickly become a staple in my closet!

The GIANZEN Men's Dress Shirt works well for me.  I am more interested in comfort than in fashion.  The size is perfect.  It did not shrink during the wash/dry cycle, and it came out of the dryer wrinkle free.
Loved the color. It does have a soft and great material. All shirts should be wrinkle free to make our lives easier. Recommend this awesome shirt.

Beautiful dress shirt and it's comfortable too. The fit is about right for me so I'd say it may run a tad big. Order your usual size though. I've only washed it once and it's held up nicely. Let's see how it looks 4 washes from now though. Time will tell.

The Gianzen Men's Regular Fit Dress Shirt fits perfectly and is made from high-quality material. I am 6'3", 254 pounds, and muscular, and I am between L and XL but I ordered XL, which fits perfectly. The fabric is not see through, and the sleeve length is just perfect. It’s neither too thin nor too heavy, and it truly is wrinkle free with a silky texture. This shirt has already become one of my favorites. Highly recommended!
I doubt this has the cotton content claimed.  The weave is rather large and the fabric feels like pure plastic.  Looks very shiny.  Returned.

Was super surprised by how nice this shirt looks! Above average quality, easy to wash, iron, and care for, and absolutely great fit! He is 6’7” and most shirts fit him short or drown him but this medium fit him so well!  The color is gorgeous, a deep forest green, and it has not faded after one wash. Totally worth it!! I recommend ironing and or starching after washing, but I simply ironed and it created a nice soft look. If you want a crisper look, definitely starch. Very happy and I highly recommend this! Looks great for casual, formal, or just dinner style events. Very versatile !

The GIANZEN Men's Dress Shirts Regular Fit Solid Long Sleeve Wrinkle-Free Formal Shirt is a great shirt to have in your closet. cn be worn with a pair of slacks or a pair of jeans and still look great. The mustard color is very nice and the material is nice (cotton). The sizes are true.

This men's dress shirt from Gianen lives up to expectations.  It's a cotton, polyester blend but feels sturdy and solid like a cotton shirt would feel. As you can see, it's a button down dress shirt. However, there is no front chest pocket like many dress shirts have. Nonetheless, it's an overall nice dress shirt. More of a business casual than suit and tie type. In the pictures it is pretty wrinkly and creased. This was before washing. I wanted to try it on for fit. It's not nearly as wrinkled out of the wash.  The fit is pretty good, not great. The sleeves have some extra length. I wear an XL and this otherwise fit my 6', 210 frame well.  I feel it's a solid 4 stars. The price is very fair.

I usually wear a Medium or Large dress shirt depending on the cut/style, 16.5x34. This size chart was way too weird, the sizes didn't match anything a normal shirt would measure. So, I decided to go with the Large. It fits well. I am 5'10", weigh 200lbs, 44"chest. I am including pictures with measurements. The material is a little thicker, it is a cotton mix so it requires ironing. I included a picture of the shirt hanging, left side ironed and right side not ironed. I had no problems washing this shirt in a regular load of laundry. No deformations or discolorations.

This does not wrinkle after going through the washer/dryer. It fits true to size and feels comfortable. The colors don't fade or run. It is listed as a business shirt, but I often wear it unbuttoned over a plain tee for a more casual look. It is comfortable to wear over the thinner tee and has a nice look to it.

This is a PREMIUM quality shirt. It looked so handsome on my man and I was so happy with the way it fit him and how comfortable he said it was. It was truly such a wonderful product for my sister's wedding. He is 5'9 and 150 pounds.
This is such a great fitting shirt! Love the salmon pink color. Great quality. It's perfect!

Honestly, the shirt looks/feels a little bit cheap; especially the buttons which are a bit of a giveaway that this is not a premium brand.  But, for <$20, not a terrible addition to the wardrobe, especially if wearing under a sweater.
This dress shirt is great. The fit is perfect and true to size.  It's really easy to iron and looks great.

I'm a larger guy, and sometimes "3XL" and "4XL" can be relative terms.  I've had 3XLs fit me, and some that were 2 sizes too small.  I ordered this in 4XL and it fit fine, maybe a touch too big, but just "baggy", not oversized.  So, it fit me as expected.The shirt is a very nice shade of grey, and it looks very stylish.  The stitching seems good, and I think it will last a long time.  Great shirt for us larger folks, highly recommended.

Sure, it's a halfway decent dress shirt at a halfway decent price. It doesn't feel particularly durable, but nor does it feel particularly cheap. Don't expect it to last a lifetime, and you won't be disappointed. At the risk of sounding negative, this fits well and is fairly comfortable; it works perfectly well in formal settings, or unbuttoned for dinner with friends. If you need to fill out a closet on a budget, fast fashion is the way to go. If you want to dress to impress, maybe spend more than $15 on a shirt?

评论概述: Comfortable Dress Shirt at a Great Value
评论详情: I've been wearing this shirt for about a month, and I haven’t noticed any deformation. I especially love the cut around the shoulder area. This shirt showed me that you can own a quality dress shirt without paying unrealistic prices. The buttons are a slightly darker tone than the shirt, which gives it a really nice look. The fabric is comfortable.
I like the Quality and the Look of this Shirt.  The Collars will accentuate a Tie and support a Bow Tie.  You can dress Up or Down with this Shirt.  Overall very satisfied.

This is a nice shirt in regular cut, making it appropriate for office wear with a second purpose for after-hours going out.  The quality is good but not top notch obviously, good for the price point and looks nice, similar to H&M.  I wear this shirt fairly regularly and it's comfortable, but I don't expect it to last.  So far I haven't had any tears or loose threads so it's holding up.  This shirt also doesn't wrinkle heavily, at least nothing that can't be undone with a quick steaming or an even quicker spritz.  Basically, a good basic office work shirt.

I'm loving this poly/cotton blend dress shirt.  It's made of quality materials that are both comfortable and durable.  Best of all, if removed promptly from the dryer, no ironing is needed (and I hate ironing so this is a big plus for me).  The fit is as per the sizing chart so follow the chart closely to determine your best size (may be different that your typical size due to cut difference).  Overall, I'm very happy with this shirt!

I got this for my husband in a XXL. It fits him well and he really likes the color. I washed this and took it out right away and hung it to dry. It wrinkled like crazy! I had to iron it but it looks nice now. Not my favorite because of all the work I have to do, but he won't be wearing it every day. Good price for what it is. It's not see through, it's typical material, and good quality.
Nice fit and style.

The first thing that you will notice is how silky the shirt looks and feels, which makes it seem like a high end shirt. The way that it fits is also very nice, as it falls against your body beautifully. I thought it was French cuff from just looking at the picture, but it’s not, and you’ll know that if you read and don’t just look at pictures like me. But the color is so beautiful and bright that you’ll get plenty of compliments whilst wearing these shirts!

评论概述: Versatile and Low-Maintenance Men’s Dress Shirts
评论详情: I've been looking for a dress shirt that strike the right balance between comfort and style, and these shirts really fit the bill. Made from a blend of 40% cotton and 60% polyester, it offer just the right mix of softness and durability. What’s impressive is how the shirt manage to stay wrinkle-free, plus it's so easy to to care for.  I love the classic spread collar, a great feature—it pairs perfectly with a tie or bow tie, making these shirts suitable for both business and casual settings. You can wear it easily in an office setting or straight to dinner or a social event without needing a change.  The variety of colors available allows for plenty of mix-and-match opportunities, which is fantastic for a fresh and versatile wardrobe. I was impressed by this yellow color, it wasn't bad at all, and pairs nicely with denim or dress pants.  The big plus, the promise of customer satisfaction and support from the merchant gives you peace of mind it's a worthwhile investment.

Arms and Waist are Tapered for that Tailored Style Fit.  The Cloth is a little thick... not too much.. rather PERFECT .  It Breathes so that I was able to use it in 110 f degree weather.  Can be worn by itself or with a Suit.  I wear them with a Suit.  But just the Vest and sleeves rolled up.  Really puts the outfit together for me

I have not had an occasion to wear this shirt yet as it is still a bit hot here in Texas. I did try it on after opening it and I am very happy with the fit. I am 6'3" 195# and the XL was the right size for me. It is a very vibrant color (mustard yellow) and one that I did not have in my collection of dress shirts. It arrived in a plastic baggie vacuum packed and wrinkled beyond belief, but after being on a hanger for a few days the majority of wrinkles fell out. The quality of construction is very good, and I did not find any loose threads or stitches. I like the way the collar stays, and it should look good with a tie. I tried it on with a t-shirt underneath, but the material feels ok next to my skin and I could wear it without. The buttons are a similar in color to the shirt and not the cheap white or tortoise shell looking buttons on so many cheap shirts. The button holes are very tight and a bit difficult to button up the first time I tried it on. I am not sure if this will relax with continued use, but I thought it was worth mentioning. I really do like this shirt and the price at the time of this review is very good. I can definitely recommend it for what you get for $16.00. Now I just need to wait for Texas to cool down a bit and I will proudly be wearing this shirt.....

Standard shirt with a vibrant color.  The fabric is not particularly smooth, and has a tendency to wrinkle. It otherwise washed OK. Not much remarkable expect the color. Fit as expected, with some of the narrower body of a slim fit.

This is a nice dress shirt. My husband likes the way it feels. The fabric is a good quality, and it launders nicely. If I take out of the dryer immediately and hang it up, I don’t need to steam or iron it.
This is a quality button down shirt. Well-made and fits great. We have ordered this in other sizes and colors as well because we love it so much.
